DOC.criteria: Healthy Caucasians , male female age ≥20 ≤ 45 year 65 80 year . Female subject must surgically sterile postmenopausal least 12 month prior enrolment visit . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) ≥18 ≤ 30 kg/m2 weight ≥50 ≤100 kg Clinically normal physical finding include heart rate > 45 bpm laboratory value normal rest ECG History somatic psychiatric disease/condition , may interfere objective study . History severe allergy/hypersensitivity symptoms/signs ongoing allergy/hypersensitivity . Subjects high decrease blood pressure within 5 minute go supine stand position .
